function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close contact with detected humans in public places.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and higher risk of infection.","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures and regular disinfection of public areas.","Technologies":"CCTV camera monitoring, AI-powered crowd control, and automated disinfection systems.","People":"Public attendees, workers, and visitors in public places.","Owner":"Government health authorities, public health organizations, and facility management."}]}
